title: Self-Explanation-Based Science Problem-Solving Strategy Workshop for Enhancing Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Environment enhancing real-time interaction and individualized feedback through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can perform unbiased reasoning with 80% accuracy by using self-explanation in the scientific problem-solving process
Learners can apply self-explanation strategies two or more times to solve novel critical-thinking problems beyond trained types
Learners can retain 75% or more of trained critical-thinking skills upon reassessment after two weeks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
